Great hole in the wall.  Took our two small kids here and while it's quite small, it was perfect for them and the parents.  Amazingly authentic Mexican food if you're looking to escape the traditional Spanish tapas.  They made cheese quesadillas for the kids, and I'll say the beef tacos were simple yet awesome.  Parents had Margs (the wife liked guava the best) and I had a Pacifico to top things off. It was the coldest beer I've had in weeks.  Highly recommended if you're just looking for a low key hole in the wall with really good food and cold drinks.
